website_summaries.verdict: Pair of universal drop leg holsters that can be adjusted to fit many different models of weapons.
pros: Features a quick release buckle to deliver the perfect mix of security for the weapon and fast access to it
Offered in multiple designs and colors
Fits tightly, so you can move freely while wearing it
Consists of a durable nylon material
Set includes both a right- and left-handed holster, delivering tremendous value
cons: Ends of straps are too long, so they may end up getting in the way

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for airsoft or anything else really.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for playing airsoft, the range you have with adjusting for different sized guns is perfect! My current pistols are not replica models and so are somewhat short and bulky, but it fits that gun just as easily as it fits a real steel .45. It does take some work to get the fit just right, but if you have patience you will love the results. Can't beat it for the price! The only, admittedly nit-picky, downside is the mag pouch is not as adjustable as everything else and on a bulkier pistol can get pretty tight. Considering that is the only bad thing I can say, definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Skizzle

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: They obviously aren't the best if the best, but for the price especially, you can't complain, they're well made, good material, adjustable and best of all, cheap. They hold my real 1911 just fine, so yes they will likely hold any airsoft pistol without an issue and most real pistols. Probably not revolvers or sub compacts.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: I won with this one!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson requested this item during grandma's phone shopping. He was thrilled when it arrived. Admittedly, he has more than he needs which results in things being quickly tossed aside but not this. He keeps it close at hand and as he's getting older, it's becoming more useful for actual hunting than just for playing. One of the times I felt my money was well spent!
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Ragin

customer_reviews.title: Good low price adjustable leg drops
customer_reviews.text: 1st I have to say their customer svc is top notch. When I received my order it was missing the strap to the mag pouch, they replied to my email within 24 hrs and I received my replacement within a couple of days...thats how customer svc should be!....now the product. Dont expect this to be a $100 leg holster set but it does the job well especially for the price. It is adjustable so there isnt a handgun this wouldn't work for. Happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: ... a costume (Jayne Cobb from Firefly) and it worked great. A bit bulky but I've never worn a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a costume (Jayne Cobb from Firefly) and it worked great. A bit bulky but I've never worn a leg holster before. I had just a cheap toy gun in the holster so there was no additional weight to it. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yodery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This holster is so comfortable to wear! And easy to withdraw the pistol. Good quality ! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: coralsnmore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cosplays!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I love them, they adjust to every size needed for legs and waist, and yes it comes with a left and right side!
customer_reviews.author: Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Fits my airsoft bb pistols
customer_reviews.text: These holsters are good looking & seem like they will be durable. Just not sure why the left holster is different from the right. I'm short & the one on the right only adjusts with velcro. Not as tight an adjustment like the one on the left that has the plastic adjuster....
customer_reviews.author: M. Yatsko

customer_reviews.title: Read Review
customer_reviews.text: We hunt up in bear country, and wanted something that would be easily excessable. My side belt holster is in the way of my rifle and day pack. Upon putting it through its tests. I am not so happy, as it pulls on my belt pretty hard. The leg straps seem to work themselves down my leg almost instantly. The product does hold my XD40 well, even with flashlight attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Shaane Gowan

customer_reviews.title: it broke in less then 7 months
customer_reviews.text: for the price not to bad but that is it it rip then i used it 4 time only and on top of that it didn't fix the gun i was using it for but i tried to make it work but failed
customer_reviews.author: madhatter2379

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, fits most guns, and not paper thin.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a haloween costume and its durable enough to use for a real weapon, which is great because I can use it for work. Seems to be able to fit any pistol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, sure - Adaptable, FOR SURE
customer_reviews.text: I love my new gun holster. I enjoy wearing my weapon on a my leg because it keeps it at the ready and doesn't get in my way like some other holsters do. I've tried ones that go under the arm or in different parts of the waistband or in the bra but none of those are comfortable to me. Wearing this on my leg is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Todd

customer_reviews.title: For cosplay and arisoft it's great
customer_reviews.text: For cosplay and arisoft it's great. I use them as part of my "full" Bucky Barnes / Winter Soldier costume. It looks good, and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price! Can’t wait to use!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase for the price! Fiancé is lefty and I’m a righthanded shooter so we each got a new thigh holster in one purchase! I am so excited to use these! Exactly how described! Only thing is the adjustment rings are a little easy to move but that’s not a huge problem especially for what your paying! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Dieterman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for cosplay, Black Widow or Lara Croft. Can't speak for how this is in actual use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Strap ends hang a little to much ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Strap ends hang a little to much for me, however I had a hiccup with the first order and serviced immediately for a replacement. The correspondence was excellent with the company. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Holster
customer_reviews.text: Nice and they don’t flop around like some as you walk! There was some adjusting but once they were adjusted they were great!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Riojas

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These dual drop leg holsters are made pretty well. Fitment for all handguns is difficult, so, with that being said, the pistol securing strap could use a little more adjustability. My Glock 19 fit okay, but the strap to hold it in was a little long.
customer_reviews.author: David Hill

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well with my CZ 75 I had do adjust several times to make it work correctly.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: alright for the price, if i could drop the right side holster another inch it'd be near perfect
customer_reviews.author: Don B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cool for costume! Kinda large, so smaller guns don’t come out without catching come of the closeures. Very happy with the overall quality of this for the reason I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Sig P320!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm left handed and decent holsters are hard to come by without spending a ton. This completely unvelcros to make a great fit. Stored it with the pistol for a week... gtg. Great buy

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Fits just about anything and comes in a set. The retention snap takes a little getting used to, but it’s lightweight and functional.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait for the Zompocalypse!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hobbyist and I love them. Got both in a set. A bit bulky maybe but they aren’t military grade

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable Velcro attachment for the belt attachment.
customer_reviews.text: The belt attachment is mounted with Velcro and will not hold a fully loaded pistol. Would be a great holster except for the fact that the drop down is unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great for cosplay
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a cosplay costume. The holsters are completely adjustable and are made well. I would recommend for all uses.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, good value for what you get

customer_reviews.title: Durable but complex
customer_reviews.text: Very durable holster but has an incredible amount of straps with velcro and buckles all over. Overall a great product

customer_reviews.title: If you're on a budget this shupd be your last resort.
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it better if it had two straps to put on my duty belt. I have a 1911 45 acp and the second I put my 45 in there it just destroyed the velcro strap that holds it up. And the leg straps are very uncomfortable. Get something a little more expensive. This was a total loss!

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is completely useless, the Velcro straps fall apart and the holster falls down your leg all day even when adjusted. Really only okay for costume purposes.

customer_reviews.title: can't get no better,,
customer_reviews.text: My son's paintball gun fits perfect in this holster,,I'm very pleased

customer_reviews.text: I like it very adjustable. Both the holster and staps have a lot of adjustment points. Might not fit if you have big legs.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Only con for me was that the straps don't stay adjusted, they slip and loosen as I walk.

customer_reviews.title: Good length. Velcro is great
customer_reviews.text: Good length. Velcro is great. Almost too good. Leg straps have an elastic band and are very comfortable even for all-day wear. Used easily with a utility belt I already had.

customer_reviews.title: is that it rubs your leg pretty hard. but its durable

customer_reviews.text: This is a great holster for the price. Although it is probably designed for airsoft or paintball, it holds my Beretta 92 FS securely when I am out walking my dog.

customer_reviews.title: ... what I was looking for but other than that great quality! I liked the fact that the holders ...

customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find a good drop leg that doesn’t flop around when you run, but this is one of them. It can mold around ANY GUN from a Glock 43 to a Desert Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Drops too low for 5’8” male
customer_reviews.text: I like these as a universal holster and will throw in a bug out kit to store extra pistols on my legs until I can give the guns away to friends; however, not a good drop holsters for a 5’8” male. The buckle is too big and the straps are not full Velcro for full adjustment.

customer_reviews.title: and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because of the reviews, and I am very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Belt to holster strap not adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to adjust the belt strap to keep the holster high on the leg. It keeps sliding down the leg every 10 steps. I have the leg straps tight enough to stop my blood flow but it still slides down the leg. The gun don't sit straight in the holster either but it holds the gun very secure none the less. I will take off the belt strap and put my own on to keep the holster high on the leg.
customer_reviews.author: timbo

customer_reviews.title: Great with one caviat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great holster. The one thing I have against it is it kind of hangs a little too low, and I did attempt to readjust it, on my leg. This requires me to slump a little to acquiesce my sidearm. Not too important but I suppose worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure who at aokur thought this design was good enough or why no instructions where sent with this ...
customer_reviews.text: If i could have listed a zero stars, i would have. I have posted only one other 1 star review in nine years. Not sure who at aokur thought this design was good enough or why no instructions where sent with this rube goldberg of a holster, but after 20 minutes of attempting to make this thing even seem like it wanted to hold a firearm, i needed to throw it in a corner and return it immediately. I can only imagine what it would be like to use this thing in a real world situation. Assuming you could ever get the damn material to settle and adhere to the shape of your firearm.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald G Hazard

customer_reviews.title: I like how they fit on the hip comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I like how they fit on the hip comfortably. However, the holsters are very flimsy, don't keep shape, are hard to adjust and make it hard to put the airsoft gun in and the strap to hold it in place is too small even if I jam the airsoft down as far as possible. That being said it looks decent enough for my costume, just not functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Costume accessorie
customer_reviews.text: A gun holster is never a universal thing, and a weapon needs to be accessible NOW! I bought this for a costume, and for that, it's great. If a real gun holster is what you need, buy Alian Gear Brand that is specifically for your weapon.
customer_reviews.author: You need one...

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a cosplay rather than for practical use. It definitely serves its purpose as far as looks but is great for practical use. Its highly adjustable. Its clearly meant for a man and at first it fit big on me since I'm a smaller girl. Luckily there were plenty of points for adjustment and I was able to get it to fit snug and comfortably. The holster is really cool, looks awesome, and works perfectly for my costume. Its well put together and would hold a weapon nicely. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HaloHaloStudios

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Good but it wasn't big enough so I'm making adjustments for it to fit. I just wish it would of given the accurate sizing.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Husband's costume looked fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband's steampunk gun. Looked great, fit great, husband happy. What more can I say?

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Fits great feels great and great material! What's even better is I didnt realize two came in the package!!!! One for left handed people and one for right handed.

product_meta.title: aokur Tactical Pistol Leg Holster, Adjustable Airsoft Gun Drop Thigh Holster, Military Harness Pouch, Left and Right Handed Set, Black
feature_bullets: TACTICAL THIGH PISTOL HOLSTER： Very comfortable, easy to adjust, can be attached in the waist belt and fasten to your thigh/leg. Snug control of pistol with smooth release. It's versatile, lightweight and easy to wear. great for airsoft shooting, paintball, military games, hunting.

WRAP AROUND DESIGN： Additional fit and security, Quick release buckle and Velcro strap make this holster fully adjustable,Ideal for military, law enforcement, hunters, home /self defense and more;Adjustable size: Perimeter 38-55cm.
QUICK DISCONNECT BUCKLES: Allow superior flexibility, quick mounting and dismounting. Humanized design allow you to take the thigh holster on and off without having to undo your belt.

FEATURES: Leg Holster specifically made of import lightweight and durable material to fit your pistols even with a laser or flashlight mount on. High-quality Velcro straps and a quick-release buckle system round out the features with a tactical design, extra magazine attache and a frame.
SERVICE COMMITMENTS: We offer Money Back or Change New Products Warranty. If you unsatisfied with the quality of our product, you can contact us via amazon messages and 100% get your money back.
